summary: THE ELECTRIC STEERING IS MAKING A CLUNK NOISE WHEN TURNING AT LOW SPEEDS.  (CAN'T REALLY HEAR IT AT HIGHER SPEEDS)  THAT IS AN EARLY WARNING OF AN EPAS FAILURE. (ELECTRIC POWER ASSIST STEERING) EVENTUALLY THE STEERING WILL WHINE AND FAIL WHEN DRIVING GOING INTO MANUAL MODE.  THAT IS A SAFETY ISSUE!  SINCE MY WIFE IS DRIVING THE CAR WITH MY YOUNG DAUGHTER IT HAS ME NERVOUS AND WORRIED.
